typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Sno as string,
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		{Item Type} as string,
		{Sales Channel} as string,
		{Order Priority} as string,
		{Order Date} as string,
		{Order ID} as string,
		{Ship Date} as string,
		{Units Sold} as string,
		{Unit Price} as string,
		{Unit Cost} as string,
		{Total Revenue} as string,
		{Total Cost} as string,
		{Total Profit} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> csvsrc
source(output(
		sno as integer,
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		{Item Type} as string,
		{Sales Channel} as string,
		{Order Priority} as string,
		{Order Date} as timestamp,
		{Order ID} as string,
		{Ship Date} as timestamp,
		{Units Sold} as double,
		{Unit Price} as double,
		{Unit Cost} as double,
		{Total Revenue} as double,
		{Total Cost} as double,
		{Total Profit} as double,
		iscurrent as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sqlsrc
csvsrc derive(Sno = toInteger(Sno),
		each(match(startsWith(name,'Total')), $$ = toDouble($$)),
		each(match(startsWith(name,'Unit')), $$ = toDouble($$)),
		each(match(endsWith(name,'Date')), $$ = toDate($$))) ~> TypeCast
TypeCast, sqlsrc lookup(TypeCast@Sno == sqlsrc@sno,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSno
LookupSno split(TypeCast@Sno!=sqlsrc@sno,
	disjoint: false) ~> MatchSno@(notmatchedinsert, matchedupdate)
MatchSno@notmatchedinsert select(mapColumn(
		Sno = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@Sno,
		Region = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@Region,
		Country = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@Country,
		{Item Type} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Item Type},
		{Sales Channel} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Sales Channel},
		{Order Priority} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Order Priority},
		{Order Date} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Order Date},
		{Order ID} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Order ID},
		{Ship Date} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Ship Date},
		{Units Sold} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Units Sold},
		{Unit Price} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Unit Price},
		{Unit Cost} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Unit Cost},
		{Total Revenue} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Total Revenue},
		{Total Cost} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Total Cost},
		{Total Profit} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Total Profit},
		sno = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@sno,
		Region = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@Region,
		Country = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@Country,
		{Item Type} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Item Type},
		{Sales Channel} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Sales Channel},
		{Order Priority} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Order Priority},
		{Order Date} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Order Date},
		{Order ID} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Order ID},
		{Ship Date} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Ship Date},
		{Units Sold} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Units Sold},
		{Unit Price} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Unit Price},
		{Unit Cost} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Unit Cost},
		{Total Revenue} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Total Revenue},
		{Total Cost} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Total Cost},
		{Total Profit} = MatchSno@notmatchedinsert@{Total Profit},
		iscurrent
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
sqlsrc select(mapColumn(
		sqlsno = sno,
		sqlRegion = Region,
		sqlCountry = Country,
		{sqlItem Type} = {Item Type},
		{sqlSales Channel} = {Sales Channel},
		{sqlOrder Priority} = {Order Priority},
		{sqlOrder Date} = {Order Date},
		{sqlOrder ID} = {Order ID},
		{sqlShip Date} = {Ship Date},
		{sqlUnits Sold} = {Units Sold},
		{sqlUnit Price} = {Unit Price},
		{sqlUnit Cost} = {Unit Cost},
		{sqlTotal Revenue} = {Total Revenue},
		{sqlTotal Cost} = {Total Cost},
		{sqlTotal Profit} = {Total Profit},
		iscurrent
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
